title: Really poor wifi compared to other phones
content:
Hey guys,

I got a new pixel 3xl and it's performing very poorly with WiFi.

I have a Samsung Galaxy S7 and an iPhone 6 right next to it, on the same wifi network: the galaxy & iphone get moderate network strength and no connectivity issues.

Pixel 3 is showing poor signal strength, keeps dropping the connection on and off. It's quite annoying to work with.

What gives? Why is pixel struggling when 3+ year old phones are having no problems?

I can't do anything with the router, by the way. I'm in a university residence and we get one master connection. The point is that the pixel underperforms compared to other phones, not that the connection is bad in and of itself.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
